Name: Hentai LightUp
About the game: Hentai LightUp is a Lights Out Puzzle. Gameplay Guide Victory Condition: You need to finish the Puzzle. How to Play: Left click turn the block light on, as well as the block up、down、left、right. Function Keys Keyboard P: One key finish Keyboard S: Emergency avoidance (the background image turns white and you can continue to play) Keyboard N: Next level Game Features Pleasing Pictures Soothing Music
